articles.title: Cannes 2022: Deepika Padukone's retro look and Aditi Rao Hydari's regal look from the grand event will make y - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Deepika Padukone and Aditi Rao Hydari's sixth day look at the Cannes 2022 will make you fall in love with their fashion choices. Deepika's retro look and Aditi's majestic look has set the temperature soaring.
articles.content: She completed her retro look with silver accessories including a chain, hoop earrings, and a bracelet. She styled her messy hair into a ponytail and added glam to her look by wearing white stilettoes.

articles.title: Veteran South Indian singer Sangeetha Sajith passes away at 46 - India Today
articles.description: Sangeetha Sajith breathed her last on May 22 after suffering from kidney ailments. The popular playback singer has sung over 200 songs for the Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu and Kannada industries.
